markdown:
Birthmarks, in the exact shape of constellations or abstract representations of them, are thought to signify a mighty destiny. These “chosen” put a faith in astrology that even some iruxis might call superstitious. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Terwa Chosen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1658) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 83 **Perception** +19 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Astrology Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18 **Str** +6 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Deep Breath** A terwa chosen can hold their breath for 10 minutes. **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [mambele](/Weapons.aspx?ID=96)_ --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +16 **Will** +15 **HP** 140 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Born Lucky** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The Terwa chosen rolls a success or a critical failure on a check; **Effect** The Terwa chosen improves the triggering roll by one degree of success, only from a success to a critical success or from a critical failure to a failure. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _mambele_ +20 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)), **Damage** 2d6+9 slashing **Melee** claws +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+6 slashing **Ranged** _mambele_ +18 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d6+9 slashing **Celestial Might** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The Terwa chosen calls upon the stars to empower their attack. They attempt a Strike. If the Strike hits, the Terwa chosen deals an additional 2d6 precision damage. **Champion's Star** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** The Terwa chosen looks to the sky for a star to guide their attack. The Terwa chosen gains the effects of [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345).
name: Terwa Chosen

text: Terwa Chosen Birthmarks, in the exact shape of constellations or abstract representations of them, are thought to signify a mighty destiny. These “chosen” put a faith in astrology that even some iruxis might call superstitious. Items Leather Armor, +1 striking returning mambele --- AC 27 Fort +18 Ref +16 Will +15 HP 140 Attack of Opportunity Reaction Born Lucky Reaction (divine) Frequency once per day; Trigger The Terwa chosen rolls a success or a critical failure on a check; Effect The Terwa chosen improves the triggering roll by one degree of success, only from a success to a critical success or from a critical failure to a failure. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action mambele +20 (Disarm, deadly d8), Damage 2d6+9 slashing Melee Single Action claws +18 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 2d6+6 slashing Ranged Single Action mambele +18 (Disarm, deadly d8, thrown 20 feet), Damage 2d6+9 slashing Celestial Might Two Actions Frequency once per round; Effect The Terwa chosen calls upon the stars to empower their attack. They attempt a Strike. If the Strike hits, the Terwa chosen deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.
